cwitools.utils.parse_cubelist¶

cwitools.utils.parse_cubelist(filepath)¶

Load a CWITools parameter file into a dictionary structure.

Parameters

path (str) – Path to CWITools .list file

Returns

Python dictionary containing the relevant fields and information.

Return type

dict
